other_tests.findings: Frequent polyspike-and-wave bursts that correlated with visible myoclonic jerks.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Approximately 5 minutes after IV valproic acid infusion, the EEG was normal.

other_tests.findings: Pain intensity ratings during needle insertion were evaluated.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pain intensity was significantly reduced with simultaneous finger slapping during needle insertion.

other_tests.findings: Identified 1,010 seropositive patients with myasthenia gravis (MG).
other_tests.changes_over_time: New cases identified between January 1, 1986, and December 31, 1997, included 301 women and 300 men.
